page.title: 11HOUSES IN THE AREA
page.content: The houses in West Calder are made of bricks.The houses in Polbeth are also made of bricks,but some have wood layen on top of them.Some are small bungalows,some are large detached and others are terraced or semi-detached.There are 2 new housing estates in West Calder ,one is finished building and the other has just to build a few more.The houses in West Calder and Polbeth have coal fires,electric radiators or gas heating.At the moment the council are upgrading the houses in Polbeth they are refitting the kitchens and the bathrooms putting in gas or electric radiators and in the end they will paint and paper the whole house.About half of the houses are bought and the rest are rented.
